sentences.en: He is training for a prizefight.
sentences.cn: 他正在为一次职业拳赛进行训练。

sentences.en: In case there ambiguity here, that page is the prizefight one.
sentences.cn: 说的明白点, 这一“页”就是有奖竞赛那一页.

trans.tran_en: a public  boxing  match in which two men fight each other without boxing gloves, in order to win money
